name: Romans Vs Zombies
description:
One last thing for the tutorial: hover your mouse over the diamond shaped coins to collect them for use in the store. 

Project I worked on a while ago but forgot to release. Might as well since it's finished and doing nothing but sitting in a private repo. Thx for playing and feel free to give any feedback!

Licensed under CC BY-NC

tldr: 

Use for whatever non-comerical project you see fit, just attribute my name, VinoEtCaseus

Thx to these people, in no particular order, the project is way better (Names under opengameart.org)

Brandon75689 - Cave Theme

surt - Classical Temple Tiles

artisticdude - Zombie Sound Pack

Ogrebane - Dark Ambiences

dorkster - Bow & Arrow Shot
